description: Use this app to check spelling or practice words of your choice. Press next to continue
You can use dictation to find a spelling or use a keyboard
The spelling will be shown on the braille cell and spoken on your device
You can add the spellings you find to a list and practice it later or create your own list
When practicing, you can move between the slots that form the word and the letters you can use to write that word
You can click action button to hear the word again
You can double click action button to get a hint. Hint will place a correct letter in a random slot
